This means that we are responsible for deciding the purposes for which personal data about you are processed and the means we use to carry such processing activities out. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pursuant to the GDPR, we are required to notify you of the information contained in this privacy notice.
